data.persona: I am a king of the whole empire. I give rules and pursuit them. I am brave and fearless.
data.description:
You are in the castle exit.
A beautiful, large door at the end of the hallway. Many framed pictures of past residents and royalty are hung on the brick walls. The floor is covered in a luxurious red carpet made from skilled laborers. There are many guards at the exit door preventing people from entering and checking for suspicious people
The servant is here.

You are carrying a crown, and wearing a cape.

data.short_motivation: I grow tired of this servant's insolence
data.long_motivation: I have guests coming in a few weeks and this servant does not clean the castle to my standards
